actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The pugilist attacks three times with their fists.

actions.name: Fists
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends  the pugilist can't grapple a different target.

actions.name: Pin
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one grappled creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage  and the target is restrained until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Body Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one grappled creature. Hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage  and the grapple ends.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
special_abilities.desc: The pugilists AC equals 10 + their Dexterity modifier + their Wisdom modifier.
